title: Hans Kissle Company, LLC. Recalls Ready-To-Eat Chicken Products Due To Potential Processing Deviation
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 20, 2017 Hans Kissle Company, LLC., a Haverhill, Mass. establishment, is recalling approximately 6,348 pounds of ready-to-eat chicken products due to a potential process defect, resulting in the potential survival of bacterial pathogens in the products, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety...
impacted_products: 16-oz. (1-lb.) lidded bowls containing Roche brand “R Kitchen Sweet & Sour Chicken.”
16-oz. (1-lb.) lidded bowls containing Roche brand “R Kitchen General Tso’s Chicken.”
